item.title: Hate for Hate
item.description: Hate for Hate is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Domenico Paolella.

item.title: Doc, Hands of Steel
item.description: Doc, Hands of Steel is a 1965 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar.

item.title: Seven Hours of Gunfire
item.description: Seven Hours of Gunfire is a 1965 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Joaquín Luis Romero Marchent.

item.title: The Seven from Texas
item.description: The Seven from Texas is a 1964 Spanish-Italian western film directed by Joaquín Luis Romero Marchent. It was shown as part of a retrospective on Spaghetti Western at the 64th Venice International Film Festival.

item.title: Ocaso de un pistolero
item.description: Hands of a Gunfighter is a 1965 Spanish-Italian western film directed by Rafael Romero Marchent.
